response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. After careful consideration, I believe this product could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its worth to you, I propose a price of $950,000 for the product. This figure reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the potential benefits it can bring to you. I am confident that this offer presents a favorable balance between the investment required and the return you can expect. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
